### Data wrangling for Snowy Plover tab
```{r}
# Load packages and read Snowy Plover csv

library(tidyverse)
snowyplover <- read_csv("SnowyPlover.csv")

```

```{r}
# Count table of predators by year

predation_table <- snowyplover %>% 
  select(year, predators) %>% 
  filter( predators != "NA") %>% 
  count(predators, year) %>% 
  spread(year, n)

predation_table[is.na(predation_table)] <- 0



```

```{r}
# Graph using count table
predators_graph <- ggplot( predation_table, aes( x = predators, y = `2015`)) +
  geom_col()

predators_graph
```

```{r}
# Count table filtered by specific year
predation <- snowyplover %>% 
  select(year, predators) %>% 
  filter( predators != "NA") %>%
  filter( year == "2015") %>% 
  count(predators, year)

# Graph using filtered count table
predators_graph2 <- ggplot(predation, aes( x = predators, y = n)) +
  geom_col()

predators_graph2
```
